uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid
Class ConfigFile

java.lang.Object
  uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.xmlReader.SimpleElement
      uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.ConfigFile

public class ConfigFile
extends SimpleElement

Class to hold configuration data for the uk. This data is read from and saved to an XML configuration file.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Martin Waller
